+package org.vividus.softassert.model;
+
+import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
+
+import org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest;
+import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.CsvSource;
+import org.vividus.softassert.issue.KnownIssueType;
+
+class KnownIssueTests
+{
+    private final KnownIssue knownIssue = new KnownIssue("id", KnownIssueType.AUTOMATION, false);
+
+    @ParameterizedTest
+    @CsvSource({
+        "'',     false",
+        "null,   false",
+        "done,   false",
+        "closed, true",
+        "CLOSED, true"
+    })
+    void testIsClosedStatus(String status, boolean expectedResult)
+    {
+        knownIssue.setStatus(status);
+        assertEquals(expectedResult, knownIssue.isClosed());
+    }
+
+    @ParameterizedTest
+    @CsvSource({
+        "'',     null,   false",
+        "null,   null,   false",
+        "done,   null,   false",
+        "closed, null,   false",
+        "fixed,  null,   false",
+        "fixed,  closed, true",
+        "done,   closed, true",
+        "FIXED,  closed, true",
+        "DONE,   closed, true"
+    })
+    void testIsFixedResolution(String resolution, String status, boolean expectedResult)

+import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.CsvSource;
+import org.vividus.softassert.issue.KnownIssueType;
+
+class KnownIssueTests
+{

+

+    @CsvSource({
+        "'',     false",
+        "  ,     false",
+        "done,   false",
+        "closed, true",
+        "CLOSED, true"
+    })
+    void testIsClosedStatus(String status, boolean expectedToBeClosed)
+    {
+        knownIssue.setStatus(status);
+        assertEquals(expectedToBeClosed, knownIssue.isClosed());
+    }
+
+    @ParameterizedTest
+    @CsvSource({
